case_title: M. MUNAF SHAIKH vs QURESH ALI, ADVOCATE

allegations: Misrepresentation in Form A regarding employment status
Simultaneous employment as teacher and advocate
Violation of bond of service with Education Department

tribunal_findings.evidence: Suppression of material facts and submission of false affidavits
tribunal_findings.disciplinary_action: Immediate removal from practice under section 41 of Legal Practitioners and Bar Councils Rules, 1973
tribunal_findings.criminal_prosecution: Not pursued due to respondent's apology

laws: Legal Practitioners and Bar Councils Act, 1973
legal_references.precedent_case: Qamar Zaman Shinwari v. S. Nadir Shah Gillani, Advocate, 1996 MLD 513
